Text.Value: My goddess protects me. I don't fear the dark.

EditorData.logicalname: Avatar Shadowheart - Not enemy of Shar

Text.Value: *They sigh and offer to guide you to a nearby refuge.*
Lead on, then.
*Lastly, the Harper wishes you well. The path to Moonrise Towers is arduous - but you will overcome.*
I meant to infiltrate the cult. You've ruined the mission.

EditorData.logicalname: LOGIC - No one has the lantern

Text.Value: *They ready for battle.*
How about I just kill you and keep the lantern for myself?
*The Harper acknowledges your explanation, grateful to see you in one piece.*
I'm not here to explain myself - I just want the lantern. Hand it over, or die.
*You hold the lantern aloft. Its glow warms you through, chasing away the shadows in and around you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [AMN][GUS-201879] Player holds lantern up, sweep it once from leftt to right
EditorData.VFXTags: [AMN][GUS-201879] A pool of light on the ground, sweeping once from leftt to right

Text.Value: *The hunter warns you to remain still, considering why a cultist would turn on its kind.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. Harper raises his blade and points at the player.

Text.Value: *They tell you of an inn called Last Light, and promises you will be safe there.*
*The lantern flickers ever so briefly, and you hear a slight twitter - or perhaps it's simply your imagination.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Harper] Holds lantern into the air then stow it <TarikS>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows lantern in Harper's hand. The light flickers just a little, and you hear a little titter come from it. Harper stows the lantern.

Text.Value: *The Harper demands an explanation. Why did you travel with cultists?*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Harper] Draw weapon with his left hand, make stop sign with his right hand <TarikS>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. Harper raises his blade and points at the player.

Text.Value: *They motion for you to hand over the lantern. They will take it and guide you to safe refuge.*
Sorry. I don't have it anymore.
Attack them.
*The lantern flickers ever so briefly, and you hear a slight twitter - or perhaps it's simply your imagination.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] Holds lantern into the air then stow it <TarikS>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows lantern in player's hand. The light flickers just a little, and you hear a little titter come from it. Player stows the lantern.

Text.Value: The cult took me prisoner. Thank the gods you came when you did.
Hand over the lantern.
*You no longer carry the lantern. The hunter frowns, and readies for battle.*
*The Harper sees through your lies and readies for battle.*
*The hunter holds the lantern aloft. Its glow warms you through, chasing away the shadows in and around you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [AMN][GUS-201879] Harper holds lantern up, sweep it once from right to left
EditorData.VFXTags: [AMN][GUS-201879] A pool of light on the ground, sweeping once from right to left

Text.Value: What sort of refuge do you mean?
*They hand you the Moonlantern. You bask in its glow.*
*They thank you and mark the destination on your map, should you lose the way.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player hands lantern to Harper, who takes it and puts it in inventory. Fine to show only basic upper-body motions.

Text.Value: I will make my way there in my own time.

Synopsis: Narrator nodes for the after ambush. Dialgo shared between Elindale, Manus and Lassandra.
